name: The Many Me
description:
A game about a robotic mad scientist who created a machine to explore different realities. During the test it goes wrong and help S.A.M to get back to one. 

By traversing the multiple realities and completing the puzzles you can help S.A.M to be back as 1.

Get codes to open doors from computers in different realities and transfer that data by speaking into microphones that connect worlds. Solve puzzles , bend reality and push on.

HmmDeveloped - Design / Art

Lone Rabbit - Music  / Sound

EsiX- Programming

Listen to the soundtrack!

Controls:     

                          - WASD for movement
                          - Press buttons on left side to rotate world
                          - ESC to pause

*Edit Hey guys, We found there was an issue on level 4 where the blue character cannot open their door because you cannot get the code. You can complete the level by getting both characters to go to the computers then the correct microphones then interacting as intended. However the blue character door does not open. To complete the level you must do all this then get the yellow character to their door and interact.

Sorry for the issue guys.
